column3: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
DWL is a wayland compositor that aims to be similar to DWM.
xdg-desktop-portal backend for wlroots compositors based off it.
is a dmenu replacemnent for wlroots compositors
allows Xwayland applications to share screens
is a wayland clipboard manager that supports images and text
provides a similar interface to xrandr for wl-roots based compositors
is a tool to set the background image.
